about_the_game:
Enjoy short but very frenetic games that will put you in the shoes of a young and beautiful prostitute who does her best to survive in one of the difficult cities of Japan, where prostitution is prohibited and dangers are abundant.

Learn more about Mamimi, our beautiful protagonist, in the story mode, where you must prostitute yourself to get enough money to face your complicated life.

Take on our challenging arcade mode, where you have 5 minutes to locate and have sex with as many male and female customers as you can. But it will not be that easy.


⚫︎Censorship mode for streamers. With this mode you can play the game live or upload a Youtube video without worrying about seeing any type of adult content.

⚫︎Every 15 seconds you will receive a notification with the face of a male or female customer. Explore the city, find them and have sex with them before they gets tired of waiting for you!

⚫︎After having sex with a client, a buff or a debuff will be activated. The more you activate, the more chaotic your game will become.

⚫︎Receive money after having sex with a client. Have sex with as many as you can and you will make a fortune.

⚫︎ Watch out! Prostitution is illegal in Japan, so the police are on the lookout. Do not let them catch you or it will be game over!

⚫︎The mafia is also aware of the situation. If you meet one of them, do not let them catch you or they will steal your money!

⚫︎Unfaithful women do not get along with prostitutes, and neither do their butcher knives. If you trigger this debuff, look behind you!

⚫︎Use the money you earn to buy skins and gestures that will give Mamimi more appeal and personality. What could be better than looking for customers in a bunny outfit?

content_descriptors.notes: This game parodies the life of a prostitute. Therefore, if you deactivate the censorship mode, you will be able to find illustrations with sex.

name: Prostitute Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Experience the life of an attractive and sensual prostitute and seduce your clients in a city full of policemen, gangsters and cheated women in Japan, where prostitution is prohibited and your life is in danger at every corner.
